detail_desc: Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Two narrow Alice bands in different designs. One is covered in satin and the other has sparkly stones at the top.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, patterned, organic cotton jersey with a rounded collar. Chest pocket with piping, and press-studs down the front and along one leg.

Set with a V-neck strappy top and pair of leggings in ribbed jersey. Top with adjustable shoulder straps and opening cups with space for nursing pads. Leggings with a low, wrapover waist. The top and leggings can be worn both during pregnancy and when nursing afterwards.
Waist bag in sturdy imitation leather with a zip at the front and an adjustable waist strap with a metal buckle. One inner compartment. Lined. Depth 5 cm. Height 12 cm. Width 17 cm.
Waist bag in sturdy imitation leather with a zip at the front and an adjustable waist strap with a metal buckle. One inner compartment. Lined. Depth 5 cm. Height 12 cm. Width 17 cm.
Waist bag in sturdy imitation leather with a zip at the front and an adjustable waist strap with a metal buckle. One inner compartment. Lined. Depth 5 cm. Height 12 cm. Width 17 cm.

Shoulder bag in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with an adjustable shoulder strap and a wide, detachable plastic chain at the front. Flap with a concealed, magnetic press-stud and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Depth 6 cm, height 3.5 cm, width 21.5 cm.

Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps that cross and have a lace section at the back, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps that cross and have a lace section at the back, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Flared, calf-length skirt in patterned cotton. High waist with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip in one side. Unlined.

Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front and narrow trim around the neckline.

Top in stretch, ribbed jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a square neckline, long puff sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.

Ankle-length trousers woven in a soft viscose blend with a high, paper bag waist and detachable tie belt. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, flap leg pockets with a pleat, and tapered legs.

Short, wide dress in crinkled chiffon with a grandad collar and button placket. Long sleeves with a button at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a tiered skirt. Lined with a short, V-neck underdress in jersey with narrow shoulder straps.

Short, wide dress in crinkled chiffon with a grandad collar and button placket. Long sleeves with a button at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a tiered skirt. Lined with a short, V-neck underdress in jersey with narrow shoulder straps.

Backpack in grained imitation leather with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a handle and a drawstring at the top with metal ends. Flap with a concealed magnetic fastener, and a padded base. Unlined. Size 15.5x29x35 cm.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in sturdy denim with a high waist and V-shaped seam front and back. Zip fly and button and tapered legs with a seam at the front.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and a jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Short, fitted skirt in imitation leather with decorative seams at the top. High waist with visible covered buttons at the top and a zip fly. Lined.
Flared top in an airy, jacquard-weave viscose blend with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an opening with ties at the back and a seam with a flounce at the hem.
Aviator-style sunglasses with thin metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Calf-length dress in batik-patterned, ribbed cotton jersey with a round neckline and short sleeves. Each garment is batik-dyed and can vary in appearance and fade over time.
Small, folding hairbrush with a mirror inside. Faux fur and decorative appliqués on the lid. Diameter 7 cm.
KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Water bottle in transparent plastic with a print motif. Shimmering metallic snap-on lid and spout and a detachable, adjustable fabric carry strap. Capacity 450 ml.
Short shorts in sturdy jersey with a sheen. High waist with a wide waistband, and flatlock seams down the legs.

Long dress in an airy, patterned weave with a V-neck, butterfly sleeves, smocked seam under the bust, and slits in the sides. Jersey lining.

Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and 3/4-length puff sleeves. Wide, sewn-in tie belt under the bust at the front, smocking at the back of the waist, and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Short skirt in an airy cotton weave. Regular waist with smocking and a drawstring, and a seam at the hem with a wide flounce. Lined.

Running tights in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with covered elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Wrapover key pocket at the top, ventilating mesh sections at the back of the knees, and reflective details.

Oversized jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a small embroidered text detail on the front. Jersey-lined, drawstring hood, a zip down the front, front pockets, ribbing at the cuffs and wide ribbing at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved, boxy top in soft, ribbed velour with dropped shoulders, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and an elasticated hem.
Long, sleeveless dress in soft viscose jersey with a racer back, seam with concealed elastication at the waist, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.

Sleeveless dress in soft cotton jersey with a text print on the front and decorative drawstring with a sewn-on bow at the shoulders. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a gently rounded hem.

Beach dress in sturdy, printed jersey with deep armholes and short sleeves. Draping over the sleeves and down the sides, gathered elastication at the waist, and a rounded hem.

Sleeveless playsuit in a woven viscose blend with a deep V-neck front and back and wide flounce trim at the top. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist, pockets in the side seams and a concealed zip at the back.

Calf-length jumpsuit in a linen and viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck and buttons at the front. Seam at the waist with covered elastication and a detachable tie belt, pockets in the side seams and wide, straight legs.

Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a gentle V-neck and cut-out detail at the front. Cups with removable inserts that shape the bust, and covered elastication at the hem. Medium support.

Set with a T-shirt and joggers. Classic T-shirt in jersey with a print motif. Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, low crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist and fake fly with a press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs with narrow hems.
